Articles.Content:
Hello people of the KSP forum! 

I have had KSP for several years now (0.19 veteran!) and have clocked up nearly 300 hours! I have lurked on this forum for years, reading posts but never being able to comment because I haven't had an account. With the update, I figured it was time to create one, so here I am! Greetings! 

 

Also, a note for any moderators that may be reading my post: it took a day and several account deletions for me to receive my activation email.

 

I cant wait to show off my stations and bases 

 

TJH

Hello TJH, and welcome to our brand new forum!

Sorry to hear about the glitches with your account creation.  There have been several 'hiccups' with the migration to the new software.

As always, I am very pleased to welcome a long-time lurker into our community.  I hope you find it enjoyable and valuable.

Happy landings!

Thanks

 

I hope to provide some meaningful contributions someday, but now it is back to blowing launching some Kerbals!

Yeah, sorry for the delay. The forums just moved and it took a while for the servers to catch up. Hopefully it's all working for you now.

 

Welcome to the forums!
